name: A Link To The Shoot - GMTK GameJam
name_original: A Link To The Shoot - GMTK GameJam
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This Game has been created in 48h for the GMTK-2021's Game Jam.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Exploit your Soul and the link that binds you together to fight hordes of enemies!

Objective: 
  • Destroy every enemy and survive!
How to Play?
  • Deal damage:  You can use the landing area of your Soul, or the line between you and your Soul
  • Recover HP: Each Enemy killed is one HP recovered!
Controls:
  • Pause: "Echap"
  • Aim (for dash and throw Soul): "Mouse"
  • Dash: "L_Click"
  • Throw Soul: "R_Click"
  • Move : "zqsd", "arrows"
